title: Aromatic Energy Treatment
description: An aromatherapy blend with an energizing scent to help restore vitality, promote energy, and balance the mind.
cleaned_text: This aromatherapeutic energizing scent revitalizes fatigued spirits with a blend of natural essential oils. Siberian fir, peppermint eucalyptus, and sweet orange help inspire a sense of vitality and alertness for the perfect morning or midday pick-me-up Full Ingredient List Simmondsia Organic farming ** Clinical grade essential oils blend
